short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A set of tools to help you make the best trades. This project is in beta so updates are coming soon!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A helpful extension for Crypto Traders. Calculate your trade and see your profits in USD, BTC, ETH, or BNB. Check your favorite coin's Marketcap and see what it might be if it goes up in price.

Worried about security? I get it. You can check out this extension's code on github:
https://github.com/eddiemachado/kuriputo
